message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. It's a fair price considering its value and the benefits it can bring to your life.
I'm really interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Hi Bob, I understand that $12000 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm still confident in the value this product can bring to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11000. It's a great compromise that still reflects the product's worth, and I think you'll find it's a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $11000. I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Hi Bob, I understand that $11000 is still a bit above your budget, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $9500. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer it to you for $10500. This is the lowest I can go and still ensure I'm getting a fair price for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10500 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9800. Would you be willing to consider this price?
